name: Wp NssUser Register
author: nssTheme

sections.description:
WordPress Custom User Registration form it has user friendly options. If you have a WordPress website but haven’t sufficent user registration form. You can try it. It has some features which are important.

  • When you signin your dashboard then get a form and control user role permission options.
  • When you signout from your dashboard then get a normal user registration form with Google Recaptcha validation option.

How to use Recaptcha?

Go to this Google Recaptcha. Firstly register your site domain then create a new ‘site key’ and ‘secret key’. See our screenshot.
I think it will help your projects for new user registration of WordPress. ðŸ™‚

Cool Features:
* [nssUser_getForm] Just put short-code in your page or a Template.
* We are trying to validate all of.
* Multi user creation system when you signin.
sections.installation:
Please follow this Steps:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/plugin-name’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This plugin is upto date.
    Release Date – 30 August 2016
